name: SperseStab™ 1680
description: SperseStab™ 1680 is a phosphite antioxidant for use in a wide variety of polymers and lubricants. SperseStab™ 1680's higher molecular weight, low volatility, and hydrolytic stability, combined with attributes associated with its physical form, provide greater permanence, compatibility, and dispersion.

Synonyms: 2,4-Bis(1,1-dimethylethyl)phenol phosphite, Tri(2,4-di-t-butylphenyl) phosphite, Tri(2,4-di-tert-butylphenyl) phosphite, Tri(2,4-tert-butylphenyl) phosphite, Tris [2,4-di-tert-butylphenyl] phosphite, Tris(2,4-di-t-butylphenyl)phosphite, Tris(2,4-di-tert-butylphenoxy)phosphine, Tris(2,4-di-tert-butylphenyl) phosphite, Tris(2,4-di-tert-butyphenyl) phosphite, Tris(2,4-tert-butylphenyl) phosphite
